sentence.Network_en: Mr Sharma lit incense and chanted Sanskrit mantras.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏尔马先生点上香，念起梵文咒语。

sentence.Network_en: Sanskrit is related very closely to Latin, Greek, and the Germanic and Celtic languages.
sentence.Network_cn: 梵语和拉丁语、希腊语、日耳曼和凯尔特语是联系密切的同源语言。

sentence.Network_en: Most of these new sermons were recorded in literary Sanskrit rather than in vernacular language.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些新的布道稿本大部分是用书面梵语而不是方言记载的。

entry.def: Sanskrit is an ancient language which used to be spoken in India and is now used only in religious writings and ceremonies.

means.word_mean: 1. (Hinduism) an ancient language of India (the language of the Vedas and of Hinduism); an official language of India although it is now used only for religious purposes
